- Le bot lit automatiquement le Google Doc interne de votre entreprise (politique, emploi du temps, etc.)

# üîÑ Conseils de Personnalisation

parameters.content:
**Smart WhatsApp AI Assistant Using Google Docs**

üìå What it does:
Answers WhatsApp questions instantly using internal document knowledge. No training needed ‚Äî just update the doc.

üìÑ Reads a live Google Doc
üí¨ Receives WhatsApp messages
üß† Crafts AI prompt using today's date + message + doc
‚ö° Uses OpenAI/Gemini to generate a response
üì§ Sends reply back over WhatsApp

üß∞ Prerequisites:
- WhatsApp Business Cloud API account
- Google Doc with your business content
- OpenAI or Gemini API 
key
- you can setup the postgress memory using the following link:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JjBofKJnYIU


üõ† Setup:
1. Paste your Google Doc ID in the Docs node
2. Connect WhatsApp Cloud API (Meta)
3. Map the message field
4. Connect OpenAI or Gemini
5. Publish and test with a live message

You‚Äôre done!
ü§ù Need Help Setting It Up?
If you'd like help connecting your WhatsApp Business API, setting up Google Docs access, or customizing this AI assistant for your business or clients‚Ä¶

üì© I offer setup, branding, and customization services:
WhatsApp Cloud API setup & verification

Google OAuth & Doc structure guidance

AI model configuration (OpenAI / Gemini)

Branding & prompt tone customization

Logging, reporting, and escalation logic

Just send a message via:

Email: tharwat.elsayed2000@gmail.com

WhatsApp: +201061803236

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
